content:
Make this more polite: "Hi Tyra,
Regarding the weekly catering for our group meeting, can I directly use your contact information when I'm ordering from O's campus cafe? O's requires a faculty/staff as the contact.
If you can be the contact, the procedures are as follows:1. They will send you a proposal after I submit the catering inquiry. 2. You'll need to forward it to me so I can check if it's correct or not. 3. You need to reply with approval. 4. They will send you the receipt after the catering, and we can continue to reimbursement.
Is it OK for you to be the contact? Thank you!
Best,Zhenyu"
